'''Ateira''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

''Several figures slink towards you from the surrounding streets.''
''Leading them is an orlan with blood-red fur and long, sharpened nails. She sniffs the air.''

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/): Ateira was hired by [Dereo the Lean](/dereoTheLean/) to retrieve the [Cornett of Waves](/cornettOfWaves/), but she was evidently unsuccessful. She will confront you while travelling to or from [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/) with the Cornett of Waves in your stash, demanding you hand it over.

[Category:? characters](/categoryCharacters/)

'''Ateira''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
''Several figures slink towards you from the surrounding streets.''
''Leading them is an orlan with blood-red fur and long, sharpened nails. She sniffs the air.''
==Interactions==
{{Interactions

===Quests===
* [[The Cornett's Call]]: Ateira was hired by [[Dereo the Lean]] to retrieve the [[Cornett of Waves]], but she was evidently unsuccessful. She will confront you while travelling to or from [[Serpent's Crown]] with the Cornett of Waves in your stash, demanding you hand it over.
